articles.author: Harry Robertson
articles.title: A US recession won't happen, as consumer too strong, strategist says - Markets Insider
articles.description: Americans have built up trillions of dollars in savings, and are now switching their spending to services, which is less inflationary, Truist's Mike Skordeles said.
articles.content:
At the end of last year, almost nobody was talking about a US 
recession. Now, the dreaded 'R' word is on everybody's lips.
A consensus is building on Wall Street that US economic growth is soon li… [+3257 chars]
